attributes.action: Spend our money wisely on defence. Equip, supply and look after our sevicemen properly for doing this outstanding job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need defence teams that are equipped to tackle the issues of the day. If people are going to die for our country the least we can do is pay them and equip them properly to do their jobs. This means all the armed services. This does not mean consultation and big contracts for consulting and supply companies.  It means using the taxes collected that are already too high properly to gain value for money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
